title: How close relationships keep us healthy and happy, with Richard Slatcher, PhD
itunes:title: How close relationships keep us healthy and happy, with Richard Slatcher, PhD
description: Close relationships are essential to our happiness and well-being and are also an important predictor of physical health. Richard Slatcher, PhD, of the University of Georgia, talks about why the support we receive from our partners, family and friends is so important, how we develop these deep ties to each other, and the key ingredients of good and supportive relationships. He also discusses how technology like smartphones and social media is affecting close relationships and his study on “Love in the time of COVID-19.”
